fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Being within the game gives everyone a new second goal, urging them to touch grass. (They still need to complete their first goal though.)
- You are the grass they need to touch.
- Players that visit you are considered to have touched you. If you are visited by a killing role, they will not kill you.
- If you are hanged, all players that voted guilty are considered to have touched you.
- If you die, all players that touch the person/people responsible for your death are considered to have touched you.
- Players will be notified if they have touched you. You will also be notified about each player that touches you.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Visit someone. If they stayed at home, they touch you.
- Upon winning, you may post pictures of grapes in announcements. If you post anything besides grapes, your win is revoked and you die and lose the game.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Be touched by everyone in the game.
